LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S.label: Lancer "Cicada"
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S.description: Lancer, created by the Mechalit faction, using mechanoid technology. The lancer of this modification is weaker than the usual lancer and is armed with the simple weapon of the Mechalit faction.
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_S_Corpse.label: Lancer "Cicada" corpse
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M.label: Lancer "Hornet"
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M.description: Lancer, created by the Mehalit faction, using mechanoid technology. The lancer of this modification is more than 2 times stronger than the usual lancer and is armed with the advanced weapon of the Mehalit faction.
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Lancer_M_Corpse.label: Lancer "Hornet" corpse
